review.title: “Working for G.communication - NOVA as an instructor”
review.pros: Pros – Decent pay considering other alternatives. Great way to live affordably in Japan, see a foreign country and get some international CS experience under your belt.
review.cons: Cons – Career advancement is very unlikely. There is a distinct view of foreign workers as second-class by the Japanese management. Low salary if you're a professional educator.
